comment: It's total rubbish. Alex Jones tier rubbish. "Soros is a nazi!". Speaking of that will someone tell Alex Jones what eugenics actually is. When he says that vaccinations are turning kids into retards, he says that is "eugenics" and eugenics is why the nazis were bad.
